name: I'm Lost!
description:
You are a dog, and have gone and got yourself lost in a forest. Find your way back to your owner!

Keyboard/mouse supported.

Credits:

Daniel Cohen (Code) - https://twitter.com/faemir
Matt Blickem (Design, Code) - https://twitter.com/mattblickem
Kathryn Zalecka (Design, Concept Art, Environment Art, 2D Art) - http://kathrynzalecka.com
David Read (Design, Code)
Shameen Azeez (Code) - https://twitter.com/shameen_

Made for a game jam in Feb 2014

Code: https://github.com/explosivose/powerjam01
